-- | Interfacing between hint and astview
--   
--   see README
@package astview-utils
@version 0.1

module Language.Astview.DataTree

-- | Trealise Data to Tree (from SYB 2, sec. 3.4 )
data2tree :: Data a => a -> Tree String
flat :: Tree String -> Tree String

module Language.Astview.Parser
data ParseError
ParseError :: ParseError

-- | consists of a unique name, a list of extensions and the parse
--   function.
data Parser
Parser :: String -> [String] -> (String -> Tree String) -> Parser

-- | unique name
name :: Parser -> String

-- | file extensions assotiated with
exts :: Parser -> [String]
tree :: Parser -> String -> Tree String
instance Typeable Parser
instance Typeable ParseError
instance Show ParseError
instance Data ParseError
instance Eq Parser
